processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'RiskBusiness', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @invalidValue nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @r int, @t_yn bit select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có.' else N'The value of cell %invalidCell is already exists.' end create index i on @@table (mst) -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join dmdnruiro b on a.mst = b.mst -- Checking &Checking; -- Check tax code select cast(stt as int) as stt, mst into #v from #table exec AI_ERP$System$CheckTaxCode 'stt, mst', @t_yn output, @r output, '#v' if @t_yn = 0 begin if @$mode = 1 begin select top 0 cast(0 as int) as stt into #taxCodeInvalid insert into #taxCodeInvalid exec AI_ERP$System$CheckTaxCode 'stt, mst', @t_yn output, @r output, '#v', @$mode, @$errorCount &StartErrorCount; insert into #errorTable(@@errorTableField) select 'mst', stt, 'invalidValueMessage' from #taxCodeInvalid order by stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'mst'&Error; end end -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join dmdnruiro b on a.mst = b.mst delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.mst = b.mst) -- Checking select @field = 'mst' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00004'' from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.mst <> b.mst and a.mst = b.mst &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00004''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00004'' from @@table a with (index(i)), dmdnruiro b with (index(PK_dmdnruiro)) where a.mst = b.mst &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00004''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00004'' from dmdnruiro a with (index(PK_dmdnruiro)), @@table b with (index(i)) where a.mst = b.mst &w1;@field&w2;b.stt&w3;''00004''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.mst <> b.mst and a.mst = b.mst' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a with (index(i)), dmdnruiro b with (index(PK_dmdnruiro)) where a.mst = b.mst' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from dmdnruiro a with (index(PK_dmdnruiro)), @@table b with (index(i)) where a.mst = b.mst' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; -- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin --&ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; &Updating; end
